title: Avengers
review: If you love comic books then you will love Marvel's The Avengers. The Avengers is filled with action, suspense, and amazing characters. The movie comes from the last 5 movies: Iron Man, Iron Man 2, Captain America, The Incredible Hulk, and Thor. At the end of each movie the team for Avengers was metioned. Now in 2012 The Avengers have assembled and created a great movie.The story starts off with you on the edge of your seat, when a previous villain returns threating the world with his brand new army. Its up to Nick Fury,the leader, to call on earth's mightiest heros, The Avengers. Unfourtuately this is the Avengers first meeting of each other,so things don't go so well at first. After a series of events the Avengers pull it together and prepare to fight! The Avengers is a movie you will want to watch over and over again. The movie is now for sale still exciting and amazing. Anyone who knows these greatheros will be enjoying one of the greatest movies of the year.
